text: Hassium tetroxide is a chemical compound that is made up of 4 oxygen atoms connected to a hassium atom. It is one of a few hassium compounds made by chemists. Because hassium has a short half-life, hassium tetroxide has no uses outside research. Chemists expect it acts like osmium tetroxide. == Sources == Category:Oxides Category:Transition metal compounds Category:Transactinide compounds
title: Hassium tetroxide
